name: Cave King
description:
Go through the deepness of the cave and defeat the **skeleton king** ! 

The game is made of 6 levels, randomly generated, try to defeat every enemies of each of them to complete the game :)

Have fun !

**Controls : **

- Arrow keys / Left stick : movements

- CTRL / X Button : Attack

- SHIFT / B Button : Interact

EDIT : Fixed a major bug where player would get stuck at the beginning of the cave level
